plot: WAR OF THE DEAD: Z-E-R-O is an episodic series that follows a squad of four Z-E-R-O Security personnel on their various missions to destroy zombie outbreaks. They are a group of violent, dysfunctional, yet elite soldiers who are mentally and physically trained to handle the stresses of this line of work, even if they are ill-prepared to handle the stresses of life.   Written by  Joe Sena
title: War of the Dead: Z.E.R.O.

lists.title: Zombis hermosos e Infectados ansiosos = Sangre, tripas y ceeereeebroooossss!!!!
